name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Thomas Allen CRAWFORD, Jr.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Thomas Allen CRAWFORD, Jr.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Thomas Allen CRAWFORD, Jr.
No. D-3017.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 2, 2018.
Thomas Allen Crawford, Jr., of Pittsburg, Pennsylvania, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
